--- Lynxiz ---

As the peak becomes closer, Lynxiz prepares to look into the vast 
blanket of snowy terrain. "Almost there, Termitron." She sprints the 
last thirty feet to the top, and skids to a stop on a small plateau, 
her head slowly scanning the surrounding mountain sides. She 
hears something first, a small pittering of footsteps, then catches a 
flash of movement at the bottom of the mountain beside the one 
she was using as a lookout, then it was gone. "Termitron, I saw 
something, let's check it out!" Her face sports a grinning feline 
smile of amusement as she leaps from her perch, and half sprints 
and half slides down the mountain, dodging trees as she goes. 



On 9 May 2001, at 23:32, airly2000@... wrote:

> Termitron::
> 
> "Termitron follows Lynxiz"said Termitron "Termitron thinks that this
> place is familiar... Termitron's Colony could be around"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: rAuq 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Wednesday, May 09, 2001 7:57 PM
>   Subject: Home
> 
> 
>   ---Lynxiz---
> 
>   Lynxiz trots into the small frigid valley, her eyes peeled. Her
>   breath puffs a swirling frosty mist into the crisp icy air. She
>   stretches and looks around for signs of other robots. "Termitron,
>   you see anything?" Without really waiting for an answer, she
>   continues looking without much success. Her head tilts to look up at
>   the ridges surrounding the Valley, her nose twitches as she picks up
>   the scent of a deer, but she shurgs and continues. "Termitron, we'll
>   go to that peak over there and take a look around," she points to a
>   large mountain that protrudes nearly to the cloud line. "We might be
>   able to see something from there. I think I'll try a commlink
>   broadcast but I don't think we'll get much in this valley, we're too
>   surrounded with obstructions... on the top maybe.." She finishes,
>   the last part to herself. She starts plodding on to the peak, her
>   fur tuffted ears perked and listening to see if Termitron follows.
>
